entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ECDsa private key PKCS binary doesn't match the same key after X509Certificate2.CopyWithPrivateKey() (Windows) #97932
    Future
  • .NET 9 Host Improvements #97931
    9.0.0
  • Unable to configure host environment from a JSON settings file when using Host.CreateApplicationBuilder #97930
  • System.Collections.Generic.ValueListBuilder<T> does not implement Insert method correctly #97928
  • [API Proposal]: A way to change volume of a played sound with `SoundPlayer` #97926
  • [browser][mt] Jiterp Failed to patch opcode #97925
    9.0.0
  • Vector512.Create doesn't work as expected #97924
  • [NativeAOT] Rounding helpers use wrong rounding algorithm #97922
  • Question on string.Split inconsistency between `count = 1` and `count > 1` #97920
  • [browser][MT] WebWorkerTest.WaitAssertsOnJSInteropThreads #97914
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Depleted pthreadPoolSize #97913
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 WebAssembly AOT not generating trampoline functions #97906

Closed

  • Vectorize several TensorPrimitive operations for double #96452
    9.0.0
  • Illegal instruction on ARM64 Linux #90942
    Future
  • Re-evaluate if we need `RefTypeKill` Refpositions #87294
    Future
  • PGO causes regression on stateless struct instance method call inlining #97915
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] NativePrimitiveDecoder generates unaligned accesses with VLDR instruction #97912
  • Setting\getting a function pointer field with reflection not supported #97833
  • [browser] System.Text.Json.Serialization - OutOfMemoryException #97500
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Support more scaled addressing modes on arm64 #97921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Save R9 (REG_SAVED_LOCALLOC_SP) in PInvoke frames #97919
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fix possible runaway mutex in ManagedWebSocket.ReceiveAsyncPrivate() #97911
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][reflection] get/set function pointer fields #97909
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Assertprop improvements #97908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Remove more llvm restrictions. #97907
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Merged

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_EG_3A, IF_SVE_EY_3A, IF_SVE_EZ_3A #97900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Cosh/Sinh/Tanh for double #97874
    area-System.Numerics
  • Refine Bin/Hex parsing of BigInteger #95543
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97890
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Mark unaligned reads in NativeFormatReader as unaligned for the JIT #97917
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encoding for groups IF_SVE_CV_3A and IF_SVE_CV_3B #97886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix reflection-getting function pointer fields #97854
    area-System.Reflection
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Initialize R12 pointer from context in StackFrameIterator #97903
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move `DevirtualizationManager` to `NodeFactory` #97855
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Try to fold basic arithmetic operations as part of import #97901
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add ARM64 encoding for group IF_SVE_CK_2A #97887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] fix ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97868
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for Vector<T>.Indices and Vector.CreateSequence #97880
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • IL test entry points should be in types so test discovery can occur. #97904
    test-bug, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Alternative fix for ARM64 signed small type cmpxchg without LSE #97902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 8.0.x

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03

Issues

Created

PullRequests

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03

Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #7905

PullRequests

Created

  • Add proposal for overload resolution priority #7906
  • Add first-class span types proposal #7904

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582
  • Collection expressions: spread conditional expression #7864

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Huge memory usage and slow analyzers #71949
  • The problem with gRPC services #71947

Closed

  • The studio indicates that parameters need to be inserted, even though default parameters are available there. #71946
  • Can this library get all the UI elements? #71945
  • Should speculative semantic models be able to disable nullable analysis? #71904

PullRequests

Merged

  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Prepare 17.10 snap #71939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify serialization code #71944
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use v3 publishing for PR validation #71941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Web App render mode interactive auto does not switch when navigating between pages #53799
  • Cannot attach tokens to outgoing HttpClient requests #53798
  • dotnet run not working in docker container image: mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 #53797

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, mvc #53727
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53780
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53617
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web hot reload not working #52596
    8.0.2
  • [Epic] ASP.NET Performance goals for .NET 6.0 #27226

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor

Issues

Created

  • Where can I find `dotnet-sos` or `libsos.so` for `linux-s390x` and `linux-ppc64le`? #4494

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Android; Bound property not found on the model in the CollectionView #20345
  • Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 on Android when changing Window size #20344
  • Color applied correctly only when deployed #20343
  • iOS App crash (or does not work as expected) in Release mode when using default settings and sqlite #20342
  • 'Unable to activate windows store app {id}. The activation request failed with error code "The parameter is incorrect"' #20340
  • Frame and RadioButton conflict #20339
  • Provide documentation for Instrumentation / OpenTelemetry #20338

Closed

  • Typo in MAUI AboutAssets.txt #20324
  • .NET MAUI SQL Server doesn't work in release mode #20307
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    community ✨
  • Fixed shell pages with top bar #20337
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix "You" typo in raw-assets.txt #20341

Updated

  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Don't remeasure TableView if specs are the same #20130
    area/ListView
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #32984
    9.0.0-preview2
  • scaffolded one-to-many property names generate with incorrect name #32981
  • Exact match search does not work in a nested collection that is mapped as JSONB #32993
  • Execute multiple LINQ queries in a single round-trip (aka Expose batching read API to users) #10879
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #32984 - Query/Test: change query test infra to output SQL whenever we encounter an exception during query execution #33000

Merged

  • Cleanup asserts #32968

Updated

  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930
